modName: Nightingale armor and Blades sword STATS REDONE
summary: Improves the stats and enchantments on Nightingale armor sets and Blades sword stats and name.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a simple replacer that replaces/upgrades Nightingale armor stats and Blades sword stats to the more appropriate level.

Nightingale armor changes:
 -Improved armor rating for the whole set ( 17 extra armor rating if wearing the whole set )
 
 -Improved enchantments:
 Gloves ( replaced fortify lockpicking with fortify archery )
 Boots ( added fortify stamina )
 Armor ( replaced fortify stamina with fortify health, replaced frost resistance with magic resistance )
 Hood ( added fortify speechcraft )

I always thought the Nightingale armor's enchantments were a little wrong for my taste so i fixed that.

All enchantments were also made a little stronger.


Blades sword changes:
 -Base Damage increased from 11 to 16
 -Base Value increased from 300 to 600
 -Name changed from Blades sword to Akaviri katana ( original name from TES IV: Oblivion )

I always thought that Blades sword had a little low damage and value for a katana sword so I fixed that.

INSTALLATION:
Simply put the downloaded NightingaleREDONE.esp file in the Data folder in your TESV: Skyrim directory and check the box
in Skyrim Data files in the launcher.


UNINSTALLATION:
Simply delete the NightingaleREDONE.esp file from the Data folder in your TESV: Skyrim directory.



I hope you enjoy this little project of mine and let me know what you think about it. :)
author: El3ndril
